snippet.title: Star Conflict: Yith'Mor
snippet.description:
After the successes of the Ze’Ta sales launch in 4619, the Ellydium scientists immediately began developing a support ship. For a long five years, they combined the modules of a fighter cabin with crystal nodes. Finally, in early 4624, the “Yith’Mor” ship was ready for mass production. The fighter has effective support capabilities, as well as a nomenclature of unique weapons that can bring victory closer on the battlefield. Similar to other Ellydium ships, the development of Yith’Mor was overseen by Conrad Dimeni. The UMC has signed a contract with the corporation and mercenaries will be able to gain access to Yith’Mor’s crystal technology.

Official website: https://star-conflict.com
Twitch channel: https://www.twitch.tv/starconflicten 

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/StarConflict/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/starconflicten 
Steam: http://steamcommunity.com/app/212070
